None of you will know but Mystic Hour of Midnight is my brand new, completely original online rpg game for quest.

Mystic Hour of Midnight is set in the world of 'Antium', just waiting to be explored, with many cities, towns, and dungeons, and more wilderness than you can stake a stick at, loads of people to interact with, monsters to fight, quests to do and items to collect, as well as a advanced weather system, battle martix, dynamic descriptions that change with time and weather, magic, laws with a bounty system, oodles of skills to train, levels to gain and dragons to be slain. MHM is the [i:2m6l9d0d]most[/i:2m6l9d0d] courageous project taken on using the asl quest system.

I have created a forum where I will post all updates on my game, and areas for suggestions: [url=http://z4.invisionfree.com/MHM/index.php?:2m6l9d0d]CLICK HERE!!![/url:2m6l9d0d]

Post here or join on my forum to tell me what you think of MHM.

It's not finished, no. But, yes, it will be, and i promise this: soon!

Here what's done:
 * register new accounts
 * saved charaacters
 * shops
 * inventory
 * equipable items
 * time and weather system
 * alignment
 * dynamic player descriptions
 * customisable appearances
 * shapeshifting race!!
 * NPCs that can follow you
 * beautiful cities with whole populations

Coming soon:
 * weight and encumberment
 * stats!
 * quest log!
 * class quests
 * huge wilderness
 * huge world to explore
 * battle system!
 * leveling and skills!
 * hordes of monsters

if you think of anything that's not in the list and you think it should be in the game then tell me. if you think anything is stupid, tell me (don't say everything!).
